Source.Name: xerces-c
Source.Summary: Xerces-C++ is a validating XML parser written in a portable subset of C++
Source.Description: Xerces-C++ makes it easy to give your application the ability to read and write XML data. A shared library is provided for parsing, generating, manipulating, and validating XML documents using the DOM, SAX, and SAX2 APIs.
